entries.text: Thank you for calling Customer Support. This call may be monitored for quality assurance. Please briefly state the reason for your call.
Yeah, hi. I'm calling because I need to return something I ordered, and frankly, this whole process is ridiculous. I've been trying to find clear information on your website for ages!
Thank you for calling. I understand your frustration. My name is Sarah, and I'll be happy to assist you with your return. Can I get your order number, please?
It's #234987. Look, I just want to know what the deal is with returns. I bought a bike trainer thing, and it's just not working out. What's the return window?

Okay, I have order #234987 pulled up. According to our VeloFit return policy, you have 30 days from the date of delivery to return an item for a full refund, provided it's in its original packaging and condition. Let me check the delivery date on your order…
Thirty days? Seriously? I barely had time to try it out! And what about this restocking fee I keep hearing about? Is that going to apply to me?

I understand your concern. I can confirm that since you are within the 30 days return window, and if the item is returned in its original condition, you will not be charged a restocking fee. That only applies to returns made outside of that initial period or if the item is significantly damaged. However, you are responsible for the return shipping costs.
So, I have to pay to ship it back? Seriously?! After all this trouble?

Yes, unfortunately, the customer is responsible for the cost of return shipping. However, to make this process as easy as possible for you, I can email you a prepaid shipping label. The cost of the shipping label will be deducted from your refund once the item is received and processed. Does that sound acceptable to you?
Okay, a prepaid shipping label would be helpful. As long as I get my money back and don't have to jump through a million hoops, I guess. What's the email address you have on file?

The email on file is [customer_email]@email.com. Is that correct? I'm generating that shipping label for you now. It will be sent within the next few minutes, and it will include instructions on how to package your item properly to ensure it's not damaged during the return. The VeloFit return policy documentation is also attached for your reference.
Okay, great. I see it. Thank you so much for your help! I really appreciate you making this easier. Sorry for being so short with you earlier, I was just really frustrated.
You're very welcome! I completely understand. I'm glad I could help. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Thank you for calling! Have a great day!
